list-item.p: SARS-CoV-2 relies on furin cleavage for multiple steps of the viral replication process, including viral entry, protein synthesis and viral egress.
GM-CSF provides a lung protective effect, which may help to prevent ARDS and therefore allow natural immune clearance and antibody generation.
Vigil plasmid is an example of logical drug repurposing and targets multiple viral propagation steps.
